skill.name: agent.behaviors.skills.ExtractVictimsFromCrowdsWithinArea
skill.description: To extract wounded victims contained in a set of a given Crowds, localized in a the given area.

parameter.name: area
parameter.description: The area in which to find the set of crowds to extract victims from.

link.name: extractVictims
link.description: To enact the decision to make victims extracted from the crowds.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when all crowds have been visited.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the set of crowds is empty (no crowds within the area, no "victimsUnits" to act on).
